long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
bloks.social makes saving and enjoying web content easy. Use the extension to bookmark articles, take screenshots, and more.

bloks.social is like your public journal. A place where you can keep things private like a closely guarded secret or share it with the world! 

With our easy to use features, journaling across the internet is easier than ever:
